settings.text:
Welcome to our Ichiban Kuji (一番くじ) proxy service! Ichiban Kuji, the cherished sure-win lucky draw games widely adored in Japan, are now accessible through our platform.

At our store, we offer a convenient solution by providing tickets for Ichiban Kuji draws directly to our customers.

Please note that shipping charges are applied separately, and we offer international shipping to bring the excitement of Ichiban Kuji to fans around the world.

settings.heading: The Prizes
settings.text:
Prizes in the Ichiban Kuji are categorized from A to Z, with the most coveted ones typically falling within the A-C or A-E range.

A to C most likely are exclusive figures or plushies. On the lower end, prizes include keychains, hand towels, shikishi art boards, and cups/mugs.

All items in the Ichiban Kuji are unique to the lottery and are not available in stores.

Every ticket is a winner, but there's a special element called the 'LAST ONE' Prize (ラストワン賞). Only one 'LAST ONE' prize is available in each Lucky Drwa, making it exceptionally rare.

Good Luck!

settings.heading: Guidelines for Gameplay
settings.text:
Step 1) Buy a ticket(s)​

Step 2) Fill out your order preference on the comment space.

Step 3) Your tickets will be drawn and you win what is indicated on the ticket! We will record the entire process when we draw your order. We can provide the recording if you wish.

Please contact our customer service to request a recorded video or mention it on the purchase comment section.

Step 4) An invoice will be sent from Us for Shipping Costs will be sent to your email. Shipping cost is based upon the weight of all prizes won. Kindly check our shipping cost table here.

Step 5) Once shipping is paid for, your prizes will be mailed to your door!

settings.heading: Important Reminders
settings.text:
*The recording will be retained for 7 days after the purchase. If you would like to check the video, kindly contact us within 7 working days. Please note that we will be unable to provide it once 7 working days pass.

*We will make every effort to select a box that aligns with your preferences according to the order form. However, please understand we cannot guarantee the outcomes.

*We will choose boxes with the last one prize if possible. However, please understand we cannot guarantee the outcomes. If you do not prefer the last one prize, please mention it in the purchase comment.

*If no purchase comment is included with an order, we will assume there is no specified prize preference. In such cases, the prize will be randomly selected.

*For certain products marked as '選べない' ('not selectable'), we are not allowed to choose the prize. 

*For products with stocks, kuji will be drawn within 24 hours after the order is made. For preorder products, kuji will be drawn in order of the purchase when the product is launched.
